Sets default values for all properties.

public User()

Remarks

Sets Id to 0, Name to null, Password to null and Salt to auto generated random value.

IUser

User(int, string, byte[], byte[])

Sets Id to id, Name to userName, Password to password and Salt to salt.

public User(int id, string userName, byte[] password, byte[] salt)

Parameters

id int

Identification number of item.

userName string

User name (login) of this user.

password byte[]

Encoded user's password.

salt byte[]

Array of bytes used for encoding/decoding password.

Remarks

Can be used for example when getting data from database.

See Also
BaseItem
IItem
IUser

User(int, string?, string?)

Sets Id to id, Name to userName, Password to encrypted password value and Salt to auto generated random value.

public User(int id, string? userName, string? password)

Parameters

id int

Identification number of this user.

userName string

User's user name saved in Name.

password string

User's password before encryption. It will be encrypted and saved in Password

Checks if decrypted Password is equal to password

public bool PasswordEquals(string? password)

Parameters

Value compared with decrypted Password value.

Returns

bool

See Also
BaseItem
IItem
IUser

SetPassword(string?)

Sets Password to encrypted password value or null value.

public bool SetPassword(string? password)

Parameters

password string

User's decrypted password

Returns

bool

false if Password set to null; otherwise true

Remarks

Password is set to null if password is null, Empty or consists exclusively of white-space characters. Otherwise password is encrypted with th use of Salt value. Password is set to returned value.
